article_title: Illinois lawmakers receive generous, life-long health insurance

article_metadata.news_keywords: , vehicle insurance, insurance premium tax, internal revenue service, patient protection and affordable care act, pound sterling, united kingdom, united states, insurance, health insurance, goldwater institute, punctuation, quotation mark, social issues, labor, usd, health care in the united states, politics, humanities, economics, illinois, naomi lopez bauman, mary flowers, health insurance benefits, life-long health insurance, david mcsweeney, r-barrington hills, general assembly, health policy analyst, generous health insurance, health insurance plans, federal government, chicago, health insurance premium, legislator insurance benefits, insurance premiums, legislator, jeanne ives

og.description: SPRINGFIELD — Illinois taxpayers spent $1.23 million this past year to provide health insurance to state lawmakers, despite the fact that the jobs are part-time and the state is broke.
